Website announcement

Published: Aug 29, 2025 by Charles L. Bérubé

The website for the 8th International Workshop on Induced Polarization is now online at https://internationalipworkshop.com/.

Please bookmark the website and stay tuned for further updates on transportation and lodging options, registration, and abstract submission.

All announcements regarding the workshop are shared through the IP community mailing list and posted here on this website.

To register to the mailing list, please follow this tutorial.
